sentences.en: Every point made by the prosecuting attorney was telling.
sentences.cn: 检查官提出的每一点都是有力的.

sentences.en: Gideon Hausner , Attorney -- General of the State of Israel ( at the age of forty - six )
sentences.cn: 吉迪恩-豪斯纳,以色列检查总长 ( 时年46 岁 ).

sentences.en: Has the attorney general reviewed this immunity agreement?
sentences.cn: 司法部长看了这份赦免协议了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hoover had called former Attorney General Ramsey Clark a jelly - fish .
sentences.cn: 胡佛曾把前任司法部长 拉姆齐·克拉克 叫做软骨头.

sentences.en: Listening to the discussion, the Attorney General scribbled a wry note.
sentences.cn: 司法部长在听取讨论发言时, 潦草地记下了一行令人哭笑不得的笔记.

sentences.en: Mr. Attorney - General sat down, and the father and daughter sat down together.
sentences.cn: 检察长坐下, 父女俩也坐下.

sentences.en: Nevertheless, Acting Attorney General Bork followed President Nixon's directive to dismiss the prosecutor without cause.
sentences.cn: 但代理司法部长博克遵照总统尼克松的指示,无理由地解雇了检查官.

sentences.en: Now grim District Attorney Albert C . Fach made sure that the indictment was in order.
sentences.cn: 现在毫不容情的地方法院检案官亚尔伯·法克查明起诉事宜确已就序.

sentences.en: Quite a few people have filed for district attorney.
sentences.cn: 好几个人已正式提出竞选地方检察官职位.

sentences.en: The Attorney General was aware of the political implications of his decision to prosecute.
sentences.cn: 司法部长很清楚他决定起诉可能引发的政治后果。

sentences.en: The city attorney's office hasn't found any evidence of criminal wrongdoing.
sentences.cn: 市检察官办公室尚未发现任何刑事犯罪的证据。

sentences.en: The county attorney goes to the table, picks up the apron. laughs.
sentences.cn: 县检察官走到桌前, 拿起围裙, 笑了. )

sentences.en: The FBI was started under Teddy Roosevelt by Attorney General Charles Bonaparte.
sentences.cn: 联帮调查局是在特迪·罗斯福领导下由司法部长查理·波拿巴创建的.

sentences.en: The Vice President and the Attorney General were immiscible.
sentences.cn: 副总统和司法部长合不来.

sentences.en: They didn't want her as attorney general.
sentences.cn: 他们不想要她做司法部长。

words.tran_cn: 代理权；代理人的职务；代理人的身份

phrases.tran_cn: 代理人，专利代理人；专利律师；特许弁护士
